game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom from the mischievous thieves' guild
game.description: Baroness Elara's most precious possession, a rare gemstone necklace, has been stolen. She believes it was taken by the notorious Thieves' Guild and asks for your help in retrieving the necklace.
game.reward: A generous reward of 1000 gold coins and a boost to your reputation

tasks.description: Gain entry into the Thieves' Guild by posing as a new recruit. Be cautious of their guards and traps.
tasks.location: Thieves' Guild Hideout, in the city's seedy underbelly

tasks.description: Speak with the guild's leader, 'The Fox', to gather intel on the necklace's whereabouts.
tasks.location: Thieves' Guild Leader's Chamber, Thieves' Guild Hideout

tasks.description: Steal back the gemstone necklace from 'The Fox's' treasure hoard. Be prepared for a fight!
tasks.location: Thieves' Guild Leader's Chamber, Thieves' Guild Hideout
